reviewText: This is a lovely British comedy dealing with the legal profession. The title reflects a lawyer joke: What's the difference between a lawyer and a rat? There are some things rats won't do. It really is too bad it isn't available in the U.S. Would be lovely if Amazon could put it on PRIME for a while. I'd love to see it again.
A delightful romantic comedy, on the farcical side but intelligent. Excellent direction, acting, production values, and music. I can't understand why it's not available on Region 1 DVD.
